2 cops are talking. 1 is the negotiator from earlier.

Cop 1: We have to get him out of there.

Cop 2: Why don't we just bulldoze the place like we were going to in 
the first place?

Cop 1: That would make us look like monster. We have evidense that 
Cheetor guy can reformat bots assuming they want him to. We don't want 
to encourage more supporters. Besides we're having trouble 
deformatting them we need alot of test subjects.

Another plasma blast hits them (I just realized the problem with the 
first post so I'll say changes were made to his systems). They drop to 
the ground.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> OOC: DENIGH THIS!
> 
> BIC: Cheetor and Black Aracnia are in prison. Rattrap is dead. Who 
> know where Silverbolt is. Thought you might like some background on 
> where everyone is. Now to my story. Nightscream is trapped in an 
> abandoned building. Below Maxi and Pred cops are restraining seven 
or 
> eight reformatted bots. One comes on the comm unit.
> 
> Cop: Unit Nighscream. You are needed for testing. The antivirus 
format 
> has been dubbed opsolet and all units are to return to normal format 
> as soon as we figure out how.
> 
> Nightscream: SOME GREETING FOR THE BOTS THAT SAVED YOUR SPARKS! 
> OPTIMUS SACRIFICED HIMSELF FOR YOU AND YOU WON'T EVEN ACCEPT HIS 
> MESSAGE! YOU'LL NEVER TAKE ME ALIVE!
> 
> He hits them with a sonic blast. They all cover their ears and 
> momentarily fall to the ground. They continue their seige though.
